logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2ZTALKFXZA1O4currentClick) { return cv_mo2ZTALKFXZA1O4currentClick(); } } } Length:: 1:02 MinsThis is the best Entry Level Digital Camera i have ever seen! Considering the fact that this isn't an High Definition Camera/Camcorder, I'd have to say that the Video Quality is still pretty good. Unlike some other cameras out there which use AA or AAA batteries and have the hassle of recharging from AC outlets, this camera can charge itself from anything "USB" which is great. People savvy in Photography can tweak a few settings and get great use out of this Camera. For those reviewers who are complaining that this takes too long to start up, i suggest turning off the auto focus. although not being a professional photographer and not knowing all its settings, but i can tell you, it performs well for what i use at work mostly for presentations. i usually keep the resolution down to 5 megapixel as a 12 megapixel file can get upwards to about 5 MB which takes too long to upload. The Video that i uploaded was done at 640 by 480 resolution. It is about a minute long and is 86 MB in size. The Colors look pretty acceptable to me for a Basic Digital Camera with Video Function. I don't really use the Video Function but its nice to have. As far as pictures, i have not had a single grainy picture since i bought it a year ago. As a matter of fact, coworkers ask me what camera i use due to crisp pictures it produces. No wonder why the NASA used Nikon Lenses for Telemetry and Imaging Applications (Based on the information published in Wikipedia). Bottom-line, i love it and for the price and together with the Nikon name brand, you cant go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mikeyboyka
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera right before our 1st trip to Mexico- loved it.  Batteries never went dead for the whole 9 day trip-in fact the battery is still good!  Very easy to use this camera- would highly reccomend!  Love Amazon- best deals anywhere!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: C. Ray
Reviews.Content: i love this little camera. it's very small, lightweight, with a huge screen. my only disappointment is i cannot edit/but out portions of the videos. if there's a way i don't know how. but i really just think there's no way to edit the video. =( besides that i love it! i also love that it is chargeable and plugs into the wall! wow!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: michiganfishing
Reviews.Content: for the price you can't go wrong. I love it. only thing is I can't get intricate details when zoomed in extremely close on something very small...but I believe no point and shoot will. After playing around with settings you can get it pretty close though.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Daniel
Reviews.Content: this camera works wonders. takes beautiful pictures and the battery lasts a long time for the size of it. small and portable. no issues at all and i am even thinking about buying another for a close friend of mine.

Reviews.Title: my thailand trip
Reviews.Author: Rosi Viana
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera that was light weight and wouldn't be complicated to use but, would take quality pics for my trip to Thailand, this camera delivered plus, I had a prior model of the cool pics, and this one, way surpassed the previous model. The price is right, great pics even at night or when taken from the tour van. Love it and very easy to use.I will be packing it for my next trip!

Reviews.Title: Wow!  Sweet Point & Shoot Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Sophied "Sophied"
Reviews.Content: I was very apprehensive when I purchased this Nikon Coolpix online from Amazon.com.  It had the best price I've seen around, and had all the features I was looking for.  I received it late last week and to my surprise this little camera really out preformed my other Nikon camera (which I loved), and in my opinion, it is phenomenal!  I love, love, love all the features - especially the panoramic option AND is has this GREAT wide angle lense.  Perfect for my Real Estate business.  I've alreay taken tons of photos and can't tell you how happy I am with my purchase.  If it lasts longer than a year, I will be a VERY happy camper and it will be worth the purchase.  Great price, and a Great Camera.  Thanks Amazon.  You did GOOD!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3000
Reviews.Author: L. Pinion
Reviews.Content: This camera is small, easy to use, and takes good pictures. I usually use my Nikon SLR for most photoshoots but I wanted to have something smaller that I would be able to easily carry around with me for daily use. This camera has been perfect for that. The video and picture quality is great for the price and the functionality is easy and simple.

Reviews.Title: Great little pocket camera
Reviews.Author: BJMVT
Reviews.Content: Camera works well. Takes decent quality pictures for the price. It's really easy to fit in your pocket and take anywhere. Video also functions well and produces movies more than acceptable for youtube, facebook, e-mail, etc. It's not a camera for the serious photo enthusiast but the average photographer will find it extremely handy, easy to use, and that it takes  decent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S3000
Reviews.Author: leci4
Reviews.Content: I recently took a vacation and I brought my new camera and it fit in my purse without being heavy. The features are easy to use to catch my kids on the go and I got some great sunsets on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: C. Simpson
Reviews.Content: Haven't had time to use it much yet but so far really love it.  Great, clear pictures, easy to use and so small it can fit down in my pocket so I can take it everywhere, which is exactly what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix s3000
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Excellent little digital camera for the price !! Takes excellent pictures,easy to use,would definetly reccomend to anyone wanting a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: shopstoomuch
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera, especially for the modest price. Easy to use features, it takes excllent photos. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3000
Reviews.Author: Jackey
Reviews.Content: I previously had a Nikon Coolpix S220 that I smashed the viewfinder on.  It was less MPs and a little heavier than this camera.  Thought I loved the plum color of that camera, I REALLY LOVE the orange color of this camera.  It is really small and lightweight.  I believe smashing the viewfinder turned out to be a blessing in disguise.

Reviews.Title: slow and poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I got this camera at a local store mostly because it was on sale for a great price and I wanted an inexpensive back-up camera that was more portable than my high-zoom DSLR-style camera. Silly me just assumed that "in this day and age" any digital camera from a reputable brand would produce good quality pictures. Boy was I wrong!!! I have tried the factory point & shoot setting, as well as all the other adjustable options and the photo quality always ranges from so-so to outright horrible. Also, as other reviewers have pointed out, it is really really REALLY slow so taking a picture of anything that is not 100% stationary is a disaster. The slightest movement results in crazy blur (even with the motion detection feature on). Very dissapointed in this camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: A. Tejada
Reviews.Content: I got this for my dad as a christmas gift. He absolutely loved it and, more importantly, it was easy for him to learn how to use. When there's too many features he gets overwhelmed. It's also very light and slim. We're all very, very happy with the purchase. I would have rathered the touchscreen version, but it was sold out and we were in a rush to purchase before christmas!

Reviews.Title: NIKON, COOLPIX
Reviews.Author: David E Johnson
Reviews.Content: The Nikon, Coolpix, that I bought is an Excellent product and a very good buy.  I bought this for my wife, who is Camera shy.  However, she love's this camera. As an OLD film person I have never gone wron with Nikon!  I think it's a neat little Camera!Nikon Coolpix L22 12.0MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red-primary)

Reviews.Title: great camera and easy to use too!
Reviews.Author: chrissy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about 8 months ago and I love it so far. first of all, it is very easy to carry around and I can put it in my purse or pocket and carry it around. this is especially useful because I will sometimes leave my purse in the car and carry the camera with me even to more difficult places to get too. Another reason I like it is how easy it is to use. i usually set it on auto but sometimes I use the other settings and the picture quality is just great. I print them at home and just put them in frames. it is a good camera for photography enthusiasts and anyone who just wants to take good photos. Battery life is great so I don't have to keep looking for wall plugs during long trips, i can just charge overnight and it is ready to go. overall, I recommend it to anyone looking for a simple camera which takes quality photos(The reviewer was compensated for posting this review. However, the opinion stated in the review is that of the reviewer and the reviewer alone. Further, the reviewer independently selected this product to review and has no affiliation with the product maker/distributor, Amazon or the review requester.)

Reviews.Title: Great way to create memories!
Reviews.Author: susan
Reviews.Content: Have been happy with everything...screen is great, color excellent, very good quality, only disappointment was I did not know it did not come with memory card. Only holds 15 pics. Other than that highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Kirchofer
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything I expected and more. I didn't want to spend a lot as it was right before Christmas when I realized my old camera was missing. So when I ordered this one I was mainly looking for a camera that would be reliable yet affordable. I am sure I made the right choice.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Gift
Reviews.Author: Donna L. Robinson "Donna Robinson"
Reviews.Content: This is best camera if you are looking for an easy to use, no fuse, no mess.  The pictures come out clear. Lightweight camera slips in your pocket or purse. The delivery time was extremely quick. I brought this camera as a gift and liked it so much I am going to purchase one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: B Kam
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera! Pictures come out beautifully. All the settings are fun to play with. Good camera for beginners and those who want an excellent camera to take pictures with when walking around or traveling.

Reviews.Title: The perfect camera for all occasions
Reviews.Author: Israel Jose Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: The Nikon coolpix s3000 is the perfect camera for all the occasions, with great picture quality excelent LCD resolution and the perfect size and weight to carry it everywhere you go. I totally recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Little Nikon with big Nikon features
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Cox "RobertRunner59"
Reviews.Content: I own a high-end Nikon digital SLR and I purchased the Coolpix S3000 as a pocket-size camera for on-the-go when it is not practical to carry my larger camera. I am really impressed with this feature-rich Nikon little brother. The 12MP resolution is more crisp than any camera of this size I have ever seen. But the true wonders of this little gem are the many point-and-shoot settings for every type of setting. Not to mention a couple of cool extras like face and smile recognition for portraits and an automatic fast-shutter setting for quick moving targets. For an existing Nikon user, I liked the familiar menus as well as some trusted features like 3200 ISO for low light situations and digital lighting editing. There is not a feature missing from the Coolpix S3000 that I want or need.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: R. Hill
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera. I wanted a small camera I could carry in my pocket or purse for my recent vacation. This one fit the bill. It is very easy to use and I was taking pictures moments after taking it out of the box. The quality of pictures is good and it doesnt take a degree to learn how to use it. The features are good and easy to use. If you are looking for a great everyday camera for yourself or family, this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix is COOL
Reviews.Author: mustang sally
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my daughter for christmas..she absolutely loves it.  I knew it was great because I bought one last year for myself and my photos turned out gorgeous every time..no fuss no hassle and easy to understand plus the camera is as a cute as cute can get.  Came in no time didn't have to wait...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: meltune
Reviews.Content: Granddaughter has one & likes it very much, so ordered one for my husband.  He likes it very much too!  The $109.00 price was standard everywhere though.

Reviews.Title: What a wonderful Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Douglas Broadhurst
Reviews.Content: This camera was a replacement for an older cool[ix I had purchased about 11 years ago..(and it is still working perfectly). With this new camera I had purchased for my wife for Christmas, she loved it!The LCD screen is much larger than my original...and easier for both of us to use. The quickness of using as a snapshot camera is wondeful. This is just the right camera right price and right features for her and me as well.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3000
Reviews.Author: pickysagurl
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I bought for my boyfriend for Christmas, it's his first digital camera, and he absolutely loves it!! It takes wonderful pictures. Good shots at night and day. It's so small, like the size of a credit card but thicker. You do sometimes feel like you can break it by holding it, but it's not really that bad. All in all, great camera, and I got it on sale at a great price!!! You can't beat a Nikon, at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Camera is the BEST!!!!!
Reviews.Author: cxajgv "Crystal"
Reviews.Content: I loveeee this camera! I ordered it 4 days ago and I'm completely head over heels for it. It takes great pics in the night. My room was pretty dark and I was able to take amazing pics. The flash setting is great. My Coolpix has all these great features like the blink alert, which warns me that the person blinked so I can retake the picture. I went to a swim meet and I got gorgeous pics. It was amazing and the quality was soooo good. I felt like a photographer. This camera is easy to use for the average person but a tech savvy person will also enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: love this lil camera
Reviews.Author: Justusmom
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas and so far I love everything about it. Really nice screen. Pictures look amazing. Once I've had a chance to figure out all the features it has, I'm sure I'll love it even more.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for an awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Jhordn
Reviews.Content: My husband gave this camera to me as a gift and I love it! It is the best point and shoot camera I have ever owned. It has some nice features like smile detector and skin smoothing, etc. and video. Battery life is great so far. Very light and compact. It has a nice sleek look to it. I am very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Not great for a novice
Reviews.Author: K. opitz "opiemdwst"
Reviews.Content: I've always purchased SONY or Olympus Cameras and used them to death. So, needing a new Camera, it was recommended I buy a Nikon/Canon since all they do is cameras. I purchased this Nikon in blue and it is cute & pocket sized, great for travel. However, after spending a lot of time going through all the settings, I don't think the photo quality is great. I tried also to take photo's at night, using the night setting, of Christmas lights and NONE of them turned out clear, everything was blurry. The shutter speed is also very slow & I have to wait between photo's. Maybe I received a defective camera? I haven't been able to find a solution to these problem. I will be returning this asap.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix -- love it!
Reviews.Author: julienne
Reviews.Content: My 15 yr. old daughter got this camera for Christmas and she loves it!  It is so slim and compact, in a cool lime green and takes great pictures. It is also easy to use and upload to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: MaMaMia
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera lightweight can put in your pocket, quality of pictures is beautiful I couldn't ask for a better camera for the price. So many things you can do with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: WallDrug01
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my girlfriend and it works great.  Better than the Canon it replaced so far.

Reviews.Title: Ready for action
Reviews.Author: Mark M. Frazier
Reviews.Content: I really just bought this to take some sweet pictures of deer while I'm out hunting.  The camera is sturdy and easy to use.  Love the picture quality!!  Has a small internal memory that you can use to save a few pictures to.I use this with my trail cameras.  We use Cuddebacks and they take a standard SD card.  When I've got a camera in a hot spot, I walk out to it, load the card in my camera, and get my field report right then and there.  That way I know, hey- I should stay here and hunt or, pull this camera.If you don't have Prime you're missing out - 2 days after I ordered I was snapping photos of deer.

Reviews.Title: Cool Cam
Reviews.Author: Cathy Roach
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister for Christmas.  She loved it.  So do I.  It is even better than my Sony which is only 2 years old now.  It is easy to use and very small.  The price was great with the free shipping at Amazon and it came right away!

Reviews.Title: Half Disappointed
Reviews.Author: A. L. Willis
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for myself to upgrade from a 8mp Kodak Easyshare, which was an upgrade from a 4mp Canon Powershot. While this camera takes excellent close-up and outdoor pics, I haven't been able to get a decent zoomed or low-light pic yet. I've adjusted all of the settings, used auto, with and without flash and unfortunately have missed out on some once in a lifetime pics. Whenever I use zoom, the pics are blurry and grainy. I'm returning this and going back to Kodak since Canon's still have a slow shutter speed.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed - Blurry pictures galore
Reviews.Author: Rosaidh Ceallach
Reviews.Content: I have owned several digital cameras.  This one is by far the worst when it comes to picture quality.  It may say point and shoot, but it is a crap shoot as to how well the picture will come out. I could snap two pictures of the exact same thing and have one turn out and the other be nothing but a blur. Very disappointed. I would not buy one of these cameras again.  (I rarely write poor reviews.)

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: I love the color and style of this digital camera.  It is thin, sleek and easy to hold.  Just make sure you use the wrist strap that comes with it!  The display window is huge, too.  The resolution is amazing, so that I can take pictures with my friends or artistic images and still be happy with how they turn out.  I'm so happy that I purchased this product.  It is such an upgrade from my previous digital camera.  I also love the fact that I just have to plug it in to charge, no more worrying about batteries!  I haven't had a chance to play around with all the features, but I'm looking forward to it.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: carely
Reviews.Content: it is a good camera, all arrived safely, with all accessories and in good condition. I recommend this product a lot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: kdix
Reviews.Content: We are well pleased with this Christmas gift for my granddaughter. There wa no memory card ijcluded so she quickly ran out of space for Christmas pictures. I am sure if I had read the description more crefully, that dissappointment could have been eliminated. Other than that, it is a fun camera, easy to use, great picture quality and came in neon orange, her fav color!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Fast, easy to use, fits easily in pocket or purse, great quality shots and nice zoom features. I am a layman and love it. Love the color too!

Reviews.Title: Very impressed and loving it :)
Reviews.Author: Love the outdoors "Runnrchks"
Reviews.Content: I had an old Nikon Coolpix 7900 and loved it until I dropped it.  I've been searching and searching for a new one comparing with Sony, Canon, Kodak. When I saw the Nikon Coolpix S3000, I was hesitant to get it again, but it was such a great deal, so I went ahead and get it.  I was very impressed with the camera and am loving it.  I purchased the camera just a few days before Christmas, and been taking pictures everywhere.  I'm very amazed of how long the battery last...I have not had to re-charge the battery again yet and it's been a while...it's a great camera, it's small and very impressed with how clear the pictures come out :)  I would totally recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little camerq
Reviews.Author: Doc Savage
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my very non-technical wife who wanted to point and shoot.  She was able to use it right out of the box and is now teaching herself some more advanced capabilities.  It's a great little camera!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: BaZingaa
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Sony Cybershot DSCW120 7.2MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot, which was a piece of junk. This Nikon takes excellent photos and is a great price.  I love the ISO 3200, which is perfect for low light or moving subjects.  The camera is small, light-weight and super portable.  The battery life is amazingly long. I love this camera so much, I bought one for my mom for Christmas.  (She also had a Sony Cybershot that she hated.)  If you are looking for an easy to use point-and-shoot camera that takes great photos and is reasonably priced, then this camera is for you!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I actually just upgraded to the S4000 because the S3000 was such a nice and user friendly camera. I grew up using Canon products but this camera might have changed my opinion. Takes great pictures and it's slim and compact shape make it very easy to fit just about anywhere. The Case that it comes with is also a plus with the shoulder strap and lanyard. Takes high quality pictures. 12.0 MP and touch screen LCD on the S4000. Very easy to transfer pictures and long lasting battery. Also has a great video camera as well.

Reviews.Title: pleasedaspunch
Reviews.Author: norden
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item after seeing the quality of the pictures on my sister's.I am very pleased with this camera and would not hesitate to recommend it.The color is cool as well.It is easy to operate even for someone like me who is not technically minded.

Reviews.Title: Great..even if you are not a camera buff!
Reviews.Author: Robyn Herbert
Reviews.Content: I am not a camera person. I used to hate the idea of not being able to participate in the moment because I had to "preserve it for posterity." I felt as if I was a slave to the camera...But I'm starting to think that I should start collecting my memories and that means, taking more photos. I'm on my way to Japan for the Holidays and so I felt I needed something simple, slim/lightweight, and attractive and that also took quality photos.So far, I am pleased with this camera. One of the best features is that it's easy to navigate through the menu screens (a must have if you have a low camera IQ, like me). The lack of a paper manual isn't a big deal as I am on my computer quite a bit and just saved the pdf to my hard drive and also emailed it to myself so that I can refer to it while I'm on my trip.The auto focus and anti-vibration technology took some time to figure out, but once you start taking photos (and read the manual) you'll become accustomed to the tendencies of the camera.I love taking pictures of my food and so one of my favorite "scene" options is FOOD. It allows you to choose 4 or 5 different color balances while viewing the image so you can take the highest quality shot. Then just focus and voilà, Bushia's Holiday Makowiec (a Polish coffee cake) is pleasantly preserved.

Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL SLIM CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Lizy
Reviews.Content: Nice camera. Got it for a gift. Had seen this same camera for 149.99 and they were sold out. Great price for a great camera.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: blaquepheonix
Reviews.Content: loads of features, and very good picture quality...I would recommend this to a friend; as a matter of fact I gave it to a close friend and plan to get another.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: eaanderson17
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 76 year old grandmother who had been using disposable cameras to take pictures of the grandkids and great-grandkids.  She was a little nervous at the thought of a digital camera, but this has been beyond easy to use.  Not to mention the pictures have turned out great.  I would recommend this camera and glad that I purchased it.  The green color is great and fun as well.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this camera to replace another Coolpix that got dropped on concrete. The camera is easy to use for everyday-picture taking pretty much out of the box. It is very slim and might feel awkward if you have big hands. My husband doesn't love how small it is but I do because it fits in a purse without taking up much space. The menus are pretty intuitive and easy to navigate. If you want to get more involved in settings and special features to really make the most of this camera you have to read through the users manual which is included on a disc as a pdf file. Love the feature that reduces vibration as I have a slight hand tremor that makes my pictures always a little blurry. Also really like that the camera can be charged with a USB via the computer and that the battery charger doesn't require you to take the batteries out of the camera to charge them. Our previous camera did and it was a pain. Overall this is a great, inexpensive camera that takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3000
Reviews.Author: Becca
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a digital camera that was small in size and had at least 10 MP. I also wanted the best value for the money.  I searched several websites and reviewed a lot of cameras and the Nikon Coolpix S3000 was always in my top five.  I was replacing a broken Casio Exilim that I had purchased over 4 years ago and was considering another Casio but this camera was a better all-round choice.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: DetroitKris
Reviews.Content: I received this camera last Christmas and just love it.  Because of its great perfomance and reliability, I recently purchased one for my 12 year old daughter.  She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Chelsea Christopherson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because after reading all of the different reviews, Nikon seemed like a good brand.  I have not been disapointed yet!  This camera takes awesome pictures and is so easy to use!  I am not a professional photographer, but I like to have a camera on me at all times because you never know when you'll capture the moment.  This camera is small and makes it easy to stick in a pocket or your purse.  The color is great too!  Overall, best camera I've owned yet!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use EXCELLENT Photos and Great Value
Reviews.Author: Wabe "Tull fan"
Reviews.Content: I waited a long time to buy a point and shoot digital camera.  I bought a super zoom model a few years ago and it definitely does not fit in my pocket.  The Nikon Coolpix S3000 is a great COMPACT point and shoot camera.  It takes amazing, clear, brilliant photos and is so easy to use, even I got the hang of it in short order.  And I am really techno-phobic.  The included User's Manual on Disc is the best camera manual I have ever used and the Nikon Software Suite is useful and easy to understand.  I have owned this camera for only a few weeks and I am thoroughly impressed with the quality of photos and how easy it is to use.  The viewing screen on the Nikon Coolpix S3000 can be seen outdoors in full sunlight - something my previous camera could not accomplish.  I took a chance on this model without an optical viewfinder, but so far I haven't needed one.  All this for under $150 .... WOW !!!!

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: thriftyshoppingmom
Reviews.Content: we have had this camera for a few months now, and I really like it.  the color is awesome! and it works really nice. takes pictures quickly, pictures turn out good.  lots of options.  if anything, my only complaint would be that it takes a little while from after you take one picture to be able to take the next, but nothing horrible.  overall a nice little camera.

Reviews.Title: nikon s3000
Reviews.Author: stran420
Reviews.Content: beautiful color. i have no complaints about this camera. nice and small. takes good photos.very clear too

Reviews.Title: Great in everyway, except good pictures.
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Phillips
Reviews.Content: Would you go to a restaurant, where everything was great but the food? The S3000 is my 3rd Nikon and you wonder why, would "NIKON" sell a camera with lousy imaging? I read other reviews about poor images and they were right.I thought my glasses needed cleaning when I saw my first photos.If poor photographic results don't matter, buy the "UNCOOLPIX" S3000. It's cute and makes a wonderful paperweight. I will make I my last Nikon.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: M. Velasquez "Curioso"
Reviews.Content: This camera is small, fast and the price is nice......... I love it...

Reviews.Title: Out of Focus
Reviews.Author: janesairplane
Reviews.Content: I am a professional photographer and am used to my Nikon D80 SLR but wanted a smaller camera to carry on my person for the immediate need to capture a photo. After reading many reviews, I purchased this Nikon Coolpix s3000 and prepared myself for an easy to pocket point and shoot that would take good quality photos... I was let down. Though I am hoping it was a defect in my particular camera, I could not get it to focus on any setting. All of my photos were blurry and distorted. The auto-focus searched loudly and consistently but it refused to focus clearly. For a point and shoot camera with VR and multiple shooting modes, I expected to be impressed by good quality photos. I was not. I had to return the camera after a few days and I cannot bring myself to get another of this model for fear of the same issue. I do hope that it was merely the camera I received and is not reflective of this Nikon model, as I adore my Nikon SLR cameras.

Reviews.Title: finally.. a good camera
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: in college I had a canon powershot.. one of the earlier models, but at the time it was the creme de la creme of the digi cam world. it's last night ended with my roommate dropping it into a solo cup and it pretty much dissolved our friendship and trust as well! but anyway, with her promising to replace it she did so with a casio camera where everyone ended up washed out or blurry. so after going about 3 years with that camera i was in dire need of this one. my boyfriend has a professional nikon, two of my good friends (who would never drop cameras into solo cups!) have nikons and the numerous reviews on this camera swayed me in the choice to charge it to my card and wait to see.the color of the camera is cute. it's really cute and everyone knows it's mine.i bought this for the summer, my upcoming vacations and partying with my friends. i have yet to take a blurry picture with this camera even when we're holding it with one hand, drunk, falling over in our living room. the camera is small enough you can literally put it in your back pocket. i loved bringing this with me to the big e, but it was too crowded for me to document everything.. so i guess i liked the idea of having it with me. my main priority is pictures of friends and landscapes, sometimes ebay and i haven't had a bad picture yet.if you're on the fence, just do it and i promise you will be happy. it's small and adaptable.. if you must play with the options then you can but i pretty much have been ok with the defaults.

Reviews.Title: Worst purchase ever!!!!
Reviews.Author: Fatima
Reviews.Content: I got one of these as my "party cam" to take around with me everywhere.  The image quality is HORRIBLE unless you have a lot of light.  Useless.  I had a Canon Elph (5 MP) and Exilim (8 MP) before this one and both were WAY better.  I wish I didn't cheap out and buy this useless camera.  Instead, I should have spent a little bit more on a Canon.

Reviews.Title: Nikon should be better
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: I usually use a DSLR, but wanted something pocket size. I used to use a Canon Powershot years ago, and was always happy with the results. I can't say the same for this camera. The quality stinks. Even in nice lighting, the pictures look bad. Like they were taken on a phone camera. My sister uses a Canon point and shoot now that is much better. Seems like Canon does a better job with the little guys.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Customer Service is Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: The camera was great for the first few months.  Small yet good quality photos.  I enjoyed it.  BUT within 6 months it stopped working properly.  It is still under warranty so I contacted Nikon and explained the problem.  They took my email address and said they would send me an email with a link so I could reply to the link and attach photos so Nikon could determine if I needed to send the camera in for repair.  3 days later, I still had not received any emails from Nikon so I called back.  It turns out they got my email address wrong (even though I repeated it twice and they repeated it back correctly) so said they would resend it.  2 days later I still had not received the email so called again.  Finally received it a few hours later.  I replied to the email immediately.  2 more weeks passed before I finally received a response saying yes I have to send the camera in - shipped at my own expense.  It took 18 days to get the camera back, supposedly repaired.  However, it was not actually fixed.  I called Nikon again and was told I would be sent an email with a prepaid shipping label so I could, once again, return the camera.  Once again, 2 days have gone by yet I have not received an email.  I just called Nikon and was told by the supervisor that they have to "follow proper protocol" in order to email the label and it takes 1 - 2 days.  I explained it had been 51 hours since my phone call... she said it is still only the 2nd day (um, really?) and to  let them do their jobs and I would eventually get the label.  I requested a refund and was told it is not possible, they do not issue refunds under any circumstance.  So... I have had a non functioning camera for 3 months and cannot get my money back.  Stay away from Nikon!!

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever!
Reviews.Author: Mays
Reviews.Content: This has to the THE WORST camera I have ever owned! I haven't even owned for 3 months and it is already falling apart. The screen is cracked and keeps spreading, and since the screen in cracked, I can't view videos or anything. And the part that you put the memory card in does not work anymore, you can put the card in, but when you try to eject the card, it won't let you, you have to force the card out. It also keeps telling me my memory is full even though I have an empty 8 gb memory card in it. And when I called Nikon to get it fixed they told me my warranty was voided because the screen was cracked, and if I wanted it fixed, I would have to ship it to them before I could get an estimate! WORST CAMERA EVER!

Reviews.Title: good option for non-profesionals
Reviews.Author: Carlos J. Miranda Pantoja "Carlos Miranda"
Reviews.Content: The price is attractive, easy to operate, lightweight and has a lot of options you can choose from to take good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Not like the other Nikon I've purchased
Reviews.Author: mom of three
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas.  She loved the color and the function of the camera. In the middle of February the zoom quit working and wouldn't take pictures.  I had a hard time contacting Amazon, but when I searched "contact amazon" I was able to get a phone number.  The Amazon representative was very helpful and yes I will continue to use Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Hopkins "science mom"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great color, has great features, & takes great pictures!  I am very pleased with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Not what I hoped for.
Reviews.Author: Noah Baker
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a sleek little camera that is very portable. If you have good lighting this camera can take some awesome pictures but when conditions are less than perfect its a crap shoot to see if you will get a useable pic. There are several modes that help with this after you learn how to use them and with experience using this camera you can improve your odds but some pics just will NOT come out no matter how hard you try and how many modes you select. The worst problem overall is picture blur, a lot of blur. My sister in law had a Nikon Coolpix that so impressed me that I got this one...big mistake. I have read several places including Consumer Reports and all reviews point to one basic fact; there is a wide variance of good versus bad in the family of Coolpix cameras from Nikon. Goes with out saying pay attention to the reviews for each specific model of Coolpix as some are great and others not so much.

Reviews.Title: Nikon cooplpix...great little camera
Reviews.Author: retired
Reviews.Content: I have owned several Nikon cameras...Last year I bought a competitors camera and it barely lasted a year.  My Nikons have always had a good "life".  This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures.  I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: nikon cameras
Reviews.Author: marvin
Reviews.Content: like all the nikon cameras i have ownedthis camera will do what it is supposed to to with easeit is a great camera to carry with you for types of picture taking.

Reviews.Title: Good One!
Reviews.Author: Dinesh Pinisetty
Reviews.Content: Camera looks awesome. Did not try all the features yet, but the ones I tried impressed me.

Reviews.Title: camera is broke
Reviews.Author: robin "rowit"
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera for my wife to take to mexico with us on vacation. After four days the camera would not work outside. I sent it back and instead of giving me another they are trying to fix this one. I would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Never AGAIN!
Reviews.Author: neverbuyS3000
Reviews.Content: I bought a Nikon s3000.  It worked fine it was good to carry it around because its small, and I carried in in a proper camera bag.I have had 3 other cameras that I have carried around and they have all worked fine.I had the Nikon s3000 and turned it on one day and the lens opened up and shut again.I couldn't turn it on.I went to get warranty on it and they said it had dust particles inside the lens.  I said to them how?  I have only had it for normal use.They said it is not rated as a sealed camera.The cost of cleaning it is more than the camera is worth.So if you carry a Nikon s3000 around and the lens doesn't come out, or it comes out and goes in again one day, throw it away.  "Foreign Particles" can get in it and all you can do is chuck it!  What a waste.  I won't be buying Nikon again.Shaun 25/8/11

Reviews.Title: Great but offer not upheld
Reviews.Author: Melodie
Reviews.Content: Love this camera for my daughter. I am very fussy about quick-focus and shutter speed, etc. It is perfect for her. My only disappointment was that the offer specifically said that a memory stick was included. It is one of the main reasons why I ordered through this vendor. When I checked the order upon arrival, before giving her this gift, I mistook the battery pack for the memory stick. By the time I gave it to her the return policy had expired and I did not receive help upon calling customer service, because I couldn't prove the offer stated the memory stick would be included.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Cathy A. Sciotto "nurse lady"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great deal! The price is right, cheaper than anywhere else. It's so small, fits in your pocket, and the pictures are great...very very clear!

Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: Tata
Reviews.Content: Very good product specially for a person like me who doesn't like to carry a camara around if it is bulky. This one is just right and it fits anywhere and everywhere. Now can take pics of grandkids whenever

Reviews.Title: Overall an awful quality point&shoot; camera
Reviews.Author: M. Cohen
Reviews.Content: I purchased the S3000 coolpix Nikon last week and am returning it today. Some photos are blurry despite keeping my hands stable, the auto focus is bad, the zooming in&out; is not smooth but rather difficult to handle, the flash takes far too long, and reaction time is very slow. Also, there is a photo which the background got "cut" onto/overlaps very sharply (not a blurry bleed) the thigh of the person - what is that?? 12MP is a joke when quality is so poor. The LCD screen is great though. Overall, this camera is the worst digital camera I have used, and I have used and owned many point&shoots; (of the same $$ value and less); my digital camera from 10 yrs ago with less MP took fabulous photos in comparison to this cheap quality camera.

Reviews.Title: AA++ Seller
Reviews.Author: G. Easley "JOLT,,,,,,,"
Reviews.Content: I Bought and gave for a gift so I can not give aa accurate and fair review for the product

Reviews.Title: I would be in the negatives, if possible...
Reviews.Author: Mae Day
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when I found out I was pregnant. I wanted a good camera to capture everything. When, I purchased, it worked well for a few months. I was loving it. Then the dreaded battery problem happened. It would go dead within a few shots. I thought maybe it was the battery. So I purchased a Nikon battery and was excited to see that the camera was working again. I took pictures, then put it in it's case for a few weeks. Dead. Again. I tried charging the new battery. It will sometimes charge, but die within a few minutes. I will NEVER buy another Nikon. I haven't even been able to use it that much because of the battery problem. I'm so disappointed. Don't waste your money. I think I will try out a Canon this time.

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever - Buy anything else
Reviews.Author: Donna Benard "Doegurl"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for convenience.  I recently replaced the battery (with a real NIKON version through Amazon) because my camera was dead.  The new battery worked and I put the camera in a drawer for the next 3 months.  Took out the camera yesterday and the Brand new battery from NIKON is dead!  When I called NIKON they only cover the camera for one year and the price to look at camera in addition to the $149 I paid to buy it, plus a new battery at $23, they now said it will cost another $60 to $100 to fix it.  No Thanks!  Piece of throw away junk!  Save yourself the time and don't buy this one.  I'm going back to my Kodak  thank very much NIKON but no thanks. I spent enough already on your cheap little camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera is ok but USB cable is not universal!!
Reviews.Author: Gemineyes6190
Reviews.Content: The camera is good, I am borrowing it from a friend right now. Some pics came out blurry but most were clear and the camera is so easy to use.  I didn't think the delay was that bad at all. The reason for the low rating is that I am trying to get the pics off, but can't because it requires its own usb cable that is unique and not universal, so in order to be able to get pics off you have to carry around a large wire everywhere you go or have to give the wire to whoever is borrowing the camera just to get the pics off! This is so horribly inconvenient and frustrating! I have several USB cables sitting right here and none of them fit so my only options right now are to drive 86 miles back to my friends house to get the cable and take the pics off at her house, or go to target and take the pics off with the card. Those should not be my only options when I have USb cables sitting right in front of me. It wouldn't have been any harder for this company to make the camera adaptable to USB, they could have even saved money by doing it that way because they wouldn't need to include a USB cable within the package since it would be universal. So that is poor design on their part and I thought this camera was great, I considered buying one for myself, until I got to this point.

Reviews.Title: Terrible pics
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Buttons "utahduh"
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this camera so I didn't get to review it and I wish I would have had the chance to read these reviews--listen to them!  This camera takes terrible pics--even if the subject isn't moving, they come out blurry, night pictures are a disaster and the delay is long so all my pics of our kids are after they've looked down or turned.  We are going back to the Canon--we had Canons for years, but they don't last very long--you're lucky to get 2 years with a Canon before they blue screen on you BUT they take awesome pics and are just as small and light.  We have a Nikon digital SLR and couldn't be happier with it but they aren't using the same quality with this model of point and shoot.  DON'T BUY--not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Worked just over a year then died
Reviews.Author: Howard Burroughs "Hounddog"
Reviews.Content: Worked fine for 13 months then Battery would no longer last over a day..And only used on two trips...It's hard to find anything that lasts over a year now...My 5 year old Cannon is still going strong...I give anything that does not last just over a year a one star...Because I feel they do not test these things right and just throw them out there ready or not.......As long as they get there money they could care less....

Reviews.Title: VERY DISSAPPOINTED
Reviews.Author: sheri c matthews
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera last year for my daughter for Christmas.  I purchased it on December 15, 2010 and I have already had to return it 2 times for repairs.  I expected more from a Nikon product.  I purchased a hard case to be sure it was well protected when she carried it around.  It doesn't have a scratch on it but it just will not work.  She previously had a Sony Cybershot and it was a wonderful camera.  She would just toss it in her bag...no hard case...and it still works...imagine that.  It has never been sent in for repairs.  In addition, the Coolpix camera is so narrow...it is not easy to handle.  I have small hands and this camera is hard for me to keep a grip on.  I have now spent approximately $20 in postage returning this camera for repairs.  This will be the last time I'll send it back and I will just chalk this up to a life lesson.  Do the smarter thing and get a Sony.

Reviews.Title: Cute camera but It no longer Charges
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera just last year and it NO LONGER CHARGES:( I really like the the look and color of the camera and it took average pictures but i cant use it anymore because it refuses to charge- even though I had been taking pretty good care of it.

Reviews.Title: Ashton Kutcher Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Retroplore "E=mc3"
Reviews.Content: I know for sure that I picked the right brand for my new digital camera thanks to Two and a Half Men star Ashton Kutcher. I love that he represents this brand and makes it extraordinary. I can produce good quality pictures, videos, etc.

Reviews.Title: Got Worse With Time
Reviews.Author: SASsy
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for over a year now and lately the photo quality has gradually gotten worse.  I've not done anything to it, so I am a bit confused.  It worked fine in the beginning, but now, the photos are way too bright outside and anything taken inside is really grainy and awful.  Plus, I hate that when you push the button to take a photo it doesn't click immediately.  I have a toddler who is on the go, so when I try to take those priceless photos I miss them every time.I have ordered a newer, more advanced camera from here on Amazon; a Sony SLR.  Pricy, but like I said, when you have a toddler who is NOT going to hold a pose, I want to capture it that second, not seconds AFTER.

Reviews.Title: No good if it doesn't charge
Reviews.Author: poolerpics
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Vegas.  I was excited about it, at first, because all of the pictures I was taking were still shots.  However, the camera goes in and out of focus so fast, that is hard to take pictures of people or pets.  I can chalk that up to user error, and not be ashamed though.  My BIG problem is that I have had this camera a little more than a year, and it will not charge anymore.  I checked out the website, and several people have the same issue.  Customer Service, very rudely, told me there is an issue with this particular camera, and if I send it back to them, at my expense, they will give me an estimate to fix it. That will be the last time I purchase anything from Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Broke shortly after warrant expiration
Reviews.Author: jrsoileau
Reviews.Content: The lens quit zooming shortly after the 1 year warranty expired. Nikon customer service wanted to charge me $80+ to fix it. This is an expensive version of a disposable camera. I expected better from a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy this camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: dxm300
Reviews.Content: I bought a Nikon Coolpix S3000 in November.  It took nice pictures and was fairly easy to use, albeit extremely slow to open and close.  However, it is now March and my camera no longer works.  AT ALL.  The lens stopped opening some of the time on my recent trip to El Salvador, and stopped opening for good a week later on a trip to an island in South Georgia.  I mentioned this problem online, and 5 of my friends have commented that their Coolpix cameras have done the same thing.  I have contacted Nikon, and while they have offered to fix the camera if I provide a proof of purchase, they will not replace or refund this clearly defective item.  This is one of the worst purchases I have ever made in the electronics category.

Reviews.Title: Unexpectedly inferior...
Reviews.Author: nychen
Reviews.Content: When I saw the price for this camera in March 2011 for around $99, I was thinking that's a great price! And the reviews seem quite positive so it can't be a terrible little portable digital camera. I was planning to give this as a gift to a friend to upgrade her old Nikon from 2004. So, I bought the Nikon S3000 and excitedly opened the box, and was happy to see the new Nikon S3000 just as pictured online.But things can be deceiving...sure the size is wonderful, slightly larger than a credit card, and about 3/4" thick and very lightweight so it's a definite easy-pocketable camera! The power to on/off is quick, buttons in good locations and very easy to understand menu, feels nice in your hand, zoom in/out is quick too, and the design looks very clean. The large 2.7" LCD is bright and not much different from a 3" (which is what I'm used to).So what's to complain about? Well, if all the photos you take are distance shots or portraits, this is probably a keeper! If you ever want to take macro shots, this is NOT the camera - the Nikon S3000 cannot focus at all! I mean I was really surprised testing out the camera. It doesn't even have autofocus! Even after setting the "little flower" for macro, I was not able to take close-up shots unless I was AT LEAST 3+" away from the object! WOW, that's some bad macro...I mean, think about the times you want to take a photo of a label, or display, or text or sign, you won't be able to with this camera unless you want alot of wide-shots. But most macros are meant to be tight.The charger is also a BIG surprise, and a NEGATIVE one at that! You cannot charge the battery unless it's still INSIDE the camera! That's just dumb. Most people are used to taking out the battery to put it inside a separate wall charger and carrying an extra battery to use, but the Nikon S3000 is designed poorly so that you cannot even use the camera while charging your battery!Overall, great price, great photos at a distance, poor macros, inability to charge battery separately, lack of autofocus are all what makes the Nikon S3000 a DO NOT BUY! And definitely NOT a gift worth giving to someone who likes taking photos! Return!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3000 - hot little number
Reviews.Author: cm
Reviews.Content: I love it and it takes great pictures but am still exploring.  Haven't figured out the vid part as yet.......

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX S3000
Reviews.Author: al-bzari
Reviews.Content: ES EXACTAMENTE LO QUE NECESITABA. LIGERO, ACTIVO, Y SIN FALLAS. ME PERMITIO GUARDAR BONITAS FOTOS Y VIDEOS DE MIS PASADAS VACACIONES. FACIL DE MAJEAR, COMODO. FOTOGRAFIAS MUY NITIDAS Y MUY BONITAS AUN APRENDO DE SUS CARACTERISTICAS ESPECIALES.

Reviews.Title: Amazing lil camera...
Reviews.Author: Juicyyybaby
Reviews.Content: I got this camera from Best Buy when it first came out. I WAS IN LOVE! The color is so pretty, and its sleek and nice. I was between the S3000 and S4000, my main goal was one that is good with low light and battery quality. Well I got more than I expected. The battery life IS AMAZING, the quality of the photos is 100x better than the new SONY cameras with that panoramic feature. I use it for everything, the video is HD really good quality and the pictures are bright and crisp. I do recommend this camera for daily use, friends, outings, parties, sports, concerts, children, dogs, bonfires, beach, etc. Now is cheaper than when I got it, and since it's also really easy to use, I'm gonna buy one for my mom, since she's traveling to Peru this up comming March :)

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: M. Guyton
Reviews.Content: Got this for Christmas.  Very portable.  I'm having to read the instructions to really understand how to work the camera to it's best use but can certainly take pics quickly without reading anything.  I'm reading to find out the BEST ways to use the camera.  Very light in my purse which was the main goal.  I wanted a camera I could take with me everywhere I go.  Not sure how long the battery lasts yet.  Since the rechargeable batteries are not readily available, I will get a second battery before planning to use this as a vacation camera.

Reviews.Title: Renovando tecnologia.
Reviews.Author: Richard Pecho Escobal
Reviews.Content: HolaCuando se graba un video en ambientes pocos iluminados no sale bien nitida, "En interiores especialmente" ojo pero si le pones una buena iluminacion no hay problemas.La camara toma foto excelentes en el dia ,  se las recomiendo por ser portatil y las funciones son faciles de manejar.Gracias

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera!
Reviews.Author: cshopper
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the money.  I was replacing an older CoolPix and have been happy with the photos so far!  I wish I went for an upgrade, though, with greater zoom capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Veronica A. Lamaak "LadyV"
Reviews.Content: This camera works perfect for what I need. It's light and compact, I believe my phone weighs more. The 12 megapixels make a fine quality picture. Even video of concerts is good because the mic seems to only accept so much noise so playback isn't completely distorted. Perfect for the average person who wants pictures and videos for personal use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3000
Reviews.Author: Lorelei "Dancing Senior"
Reviews.Content: I love the size and shape of this camera.  It fits easily in my pocket and the pictures are amazing.  Wish I had bought it sooner.

Reviews.Title: I like it alot
Reviews.Author: Ricardo E. Sioson Jr. "junbug65"
Reviews.Content: This product is light easy to carry you can even put it in your shirt pocket very nice color and easy to use. i use 8GB sdhc memory card Im happy i can take more than 2200 picture what else can you asked for. very good product.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Vlada
Reviews.Content: Small, beautiful, easy to use. Sometimes I heard some strange noise when I turn it on...I hope it won't make me some problems.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Janet H. Miller
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy using this camera and the service from Amazon was excellent;I can't say enough about that.  If you are looking for a dependable but cost effective cammera, this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Bear
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for about 3 months and I absolutely love it. I haven't found anything this camera cannot do, or that it does wrong. The battery lasts practically forever, I've only charged it 3 times and I use it a ton. The movies are really good, and so is the picture quality. There are lots of white balance options so it works anywhere, and it has special modes for certain occasions. There are even a few different flash modes good for indoor or outdoor pictures. This is the first camera I have had and I recommend it to beginners and experts!

Reviews.Title: ** NIKON S3000 CAMERA IS A HORRIBLE CAMERA, DO YOUR HOMEWORK BEFORE BUYING **
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I was excited when I bought this camera, it took great pictures and was easy to use. Three weeks later the stupid battery went dead! I followed the directions from the manual and so I Know it's not user error. I attempted several times to charge the battery but all it said was battery exhausted. This is unacceptable for the amount of money I spent. I also read that another owner replaced their battery and even with a new battery received the same message. So now I don't know whether to spend MORE money on a new battery or a new and hopefully more reliable camera. This problem seems to be all too common, you would think that Nikon would do something about the issue to keep their reputation in good standing.** I will never buy a Nikon camera again and will tell everyone I know that's in the market for a new camera about my experience.** THANK YOU NIKON FOR SELLING ME A PIECE OF JUNK!Nikon Coolpix S3000 12.0MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom Electronic Vibration Reduction (VR) and 2.7-Inch LCD (Plum)

Reviews.Title: Camera has many issues; poor design and terrible performance.
Reviews.Author: D. Smit
Reviews.Content: We own a Nikon D5000 and it's the best thing since sliced bread. So when we wanted something that we could take with us without having to worry about damage/theft/loss, we decided to stick with the Nikon line of cameras.Like I said, Nikon makes a great SLR, but stay away from their point an shoot cameras. Here's the list of problems this camera had (we returned it of course):-poor white balance on auto mode-slow to take pictures-very slow to save pictures before you can take another shot (no difference when you take a lower resolution pic either!)-will not use flash on auto mode... even in the dark-have to use manual setting if you're not outside during the day, otherwise your pictures WILL come out yellow and blurred-will only record 10 seconds of video before it tells you it cannot record video and stops (maybe needs a high speed flash card for this?)-navigating the menu on this thing is a nighmare... takes 30 seconds to get it right-resets your settings every time it goes to standby or when you turn it off! Seeing how you need to use manual settings to take a decent picture, this is a HUGE problem.Only reason I give it two stars is because it seems well-built, battery lasts for a long time, and it IS capable of taking a good picture, but only if you're interested in still shots and you have lots of time to waste while messing with all the settings every time you'd like to take a picture. To call this a "point and shoot" is a tremendous misnomer... there's no such thing with this camera! It's a "turn on, change settings, point, shoot, wait, wait, take another shot because your settings weren't just right and your picture is blurred, oh.. nm, it's too late!" camera.I'm going back to Canon for a point and shoot. I've had their cameras in the past and even a 10 year old point and shoot Canon will put the S3000 to shame when it comes to usability.This is one of those products that Nikon should have left on the shelf. They really aren't living up to their name with the S3000.

Reviews.Title: Stay away
Reviews.Author: John Rizzo "L. Rosley"
Reviews.Content: The camera worked for 3 months, though the images did not have the best color.  Then the included strap broke and the camera fell barely 3 feet. This rendered it inoperable. Nikon refused to honor the warrantee, and wanted to charge the full price of the unit to repair it. Nikon said the warrantee was voided because of the impact -- even though it was their defective strap that caused the camera to fall. They even refused to replace the strap. Support personnel were rude and unresponsive. Worst experience I've ever had with a camera.

Reviews.Title: Recommended Camera
Reviews.Author: Teronk
Reviews.Content: This digital camera is highly recommended for anyone seek for digital camera for 12 MP. It works well on my needs. I am not photographer, so it suits to myself

Reviews.Title: Camera died after 2.5 months
Reviews.Author: Nidiyao
Reviews.Content: I bought my camera July 25, 2010.  It froze while taking a picture on Oct 10, 2010.  I have heard terrible things about their customer service.  I will buy a new camera (Not A Nikon!!!!!) and try again.  I would not recommend this camera to anyone (although for the time it worked it did take nice pictures).

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: punkydodle
Reviews.Content: I did not think I wanted a Digital camers untill my grandson talked me into it.  Now that I have one, I can see where it is so much better than a 35mm.  Im still learning how to use it but I love it.I have downloaded my pics onto my computer and sent them to friends.  It is easier and quicker than my 35mm.  Plus, I get better pics. Thank you Amazon for your speedy service.  Anytime I want to purchase something, I will go thru Amazon.  You ARE dependable!

Reviews.Title: Nikon service
Reviews.Author: disappointed
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my 15 year old granddaughter.  She could not get the camera to take one  picture.  She tried, then her parents tried -- could not get the battery to charge.  Unfortunately, she did not tell me until it was too late to send back to Amazon.  So I sent it to a Nikon repair center in New York.  They said that there was impact damage and it was not covered under warranty.So it was going to cost $103 to repair it.  I called to find out some details about what exactly was damaged because it was not dropped or hit in our possession.  They said they would reevaluate the camera and let me know.  When I did not hear from them for several weeks, I emailed them.  They emailed me back saying I should call them.  When I did, I was told they had changed the repair cost to $99.  I have no way to prove that it was defective when we got it, but I will not buy another Nikon product.  If I had known of the problem early enough, Amazon would have taken care of the problem.  I have always had great service from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Not for me...
Reviews.Author: A. Williams "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: This little camera is cute and takes nice photos -however- it is too tiny for me.There is just no place to grip the camera while taking a picture...It feels incredibly awkward.

Reviews.Title: difficulty w/ camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy Landry
Reviews.Content: Took my new camera on vacation to China. I was only able to take under 20 pictures with a 4 GH chip.  Thought I might have done something wrong.  Took it to Nikon dealer, thought they found something I didn't know about and I bought a new chip of the same.  Later, the same problem happened after taking under 20 pics, it told me on the camera screen the memory card was full. I am so bummed out because I missed out on some good shots.  I checked the instruction book and couldn't find anything about it.  What can you tell me?  I like the camera and the pictures it did take.  I was under the impression a 4 GH took alot more pics than I was able to get.  Sincerely,  Nancy Landry

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, very easy to operate.  But wish that the on/off button is bigger.Thanks,Patr

Reviews.Title: J1957
Reviews.Author: J. Kelly
Reviews.Content: Camera is small and light, LED is perfect.  Pictures come out blurry, not what I would have expected from Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Will only charge battery one time and them ZAP
Reviews.Author: Karan L. Paulson "Perfectionist"
Reviews.Content: After assuming the batteries were dead I purchased 3 high end batteries.  The camera charged them only once and after that the camera did something to make the batteries go dead.  I tried these same batteries in my friends battery charger and in fact they were dead and trashed.Did not get any satifaction fron Nikon and would recommend anyone purchasing a camera to go to one where you use external charged batteries."Kodak makes a very nice comperable camera for around $100"  It takes the same quality pictures and saves money.

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: Brita Haapala
Reviews.Content: After 2 days of use, the lens broke, and we had to send it back. My 10 yr old child was crushed.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever.
Reviews.Author: Doing what I can
Reviews.Content: The stability control didn't work. Couldn't take any action pictures on auto or on an action setting. when there wasn't a lens error the screen sometimes wouldn't work after only having the coolpix open for 3 days. The images were blury when on a tripod...couches don't move so idk what the problem was.Wouldn't take some pictures, sometimes would take 3 in a row and would take forever to process all 3 would be blurry.Not my cup of tea. Over the past 8 years I've had a Kodak easy share, Samsung SL620, Insignia, and a Fujifilm, and this Nikon Coolpix with stability control is the worst camer I've ever purchased. All the ones I just listed cost less then the Coolpix S3000 too.The picture quality on the 1% of pictures that turned out was good though.

Reviews.Title: DOA, used item, shame on you, Amazon!
Reviews.Author: John W.
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived with a dead charger. The lcd screen didn't have the protective film cover but had lots of fingerprints. It is clearly a previously used item. The camera didn't charge even by using a usb cable directly plugged into a PC. I'm returning it. What a waste of time!

Reviews.Title: Darn SD Card doesn't eject!
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I lost the first camera and ordered another exactly like it to replace it. The camera arrived, I inserted an SD card and when I couldn't get it to talk to the computer I tried to eject the card. Somewhere inside the bracket that holds the card is rubbing on the card and will not let it pop out without pulling. it's going back.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix s 3000
Reviews.Author: Jacob Puister
Reviews.Content: nice and smal good handling only dont come with the memorycard the cannon dus. one point  less for the nikon. the camara is clear with good lenses.  jacob puister costa rica

Reviews.Title: Always Dead!
Reviews.Author: bash1
Reviews.Content: 1st I should say that I am a photographer that has only used Canon products until this point. And it's not that I think they make a better camera, but I would swear up and down that the make the best lens on the market. I needed a new point and shoot and I thought I would give Nikon a try. Sadly it's been one disappointment after another. The first time I went to use the camera (on vacation) it died within 20 minutes of use. Of course I threw out the receipt and had no proof of purchase to return it for a different one, so I bought a new battery... when that failed I bought a new charger...  when that failed I wrote in to Nikon to see if they could help me. No such luck!I continued to use it with complete frustration, and knew that I had to charge the battery for a full hour to get about 10 minutes of "camera on" time. Until last weekend when I threw in the towel and went right back to my trusty Canon brand. I got one of the Powershoots and I LOVE it. In comparison to my Nikon the photos are night and day better. When you push the button there isn't a 20 second delay. Try to make a 9 month old "stand still" for a photo. I'm just so sad it took me so long to go back, I have missed photos of so many great moments of my firstborns first few months.GO Canon!!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: WAVet
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to take with us on vacation.  When we first went to use it the entire camera froze and would not take And pictures.  We returned it and received a straight across replacement and have had not one problem with the camera.  It take beautiful picture and we just love the camera.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COLLPIX S3000 DIGITAL CAMERA REVIEW
Reviews.Author: MARKMIXALOT "MARK GANGADEEN"
Reviews.Content: WHEN I FIRST LOOKED AT THIS CAMERA ONLINE, MY INITIAL THINKING THAT THIS PARTICULAR CAMERA WAS A TOUCH SCREEN, SIMILAR TO OTHER NIKON TOUCH SCREEN CAMERAS. HOWEVER I ORDERED IT AND I AM STILL LEARNING ALL OF THE CAMERAS DIFFERENT SYSTEMS. SO FAR THE PICTURES I HAVE TAKEN AND PRINTED ARE OF EXCELLENT QUALITY. THE SIZE AND COMPACTABILTY OF THIS CAMERA HAS MADE ME VERY HAPPY. IT IS EASY TO MANIPULATE WITHOUT READING OR LOOKING AT THE INTRUCTION BOOKLET. I WAS MORE THAN CAPABLE OF FIGURING OUT MOST OF THE FUNCTIONS FOR RIGHT KNOW, I AM VERY HAPPY WITH WHAT I PURCHASED, IN COMPARISON TO WHAT THE ACTUAL RETAIL PRICE CURRENTLY IS AT MAJOR RETAIL ELECTRONIC AND APPLIANCE STORES, NOT MENTIONING ANY NAMES. BUT I AM STILL HAPPY EVEN THOUGH IT IS NOT A TOUCH SCREEN CAMERA,TOUCH SCREEN AND VOICE ACTIVATED CAMERAS ARE MY PREFERENCE. THANK YOU NIKON, AMAZON AND THE SELLER FOR A GREAT PRODUCT, AND AN YOUR INCREDIBLE PRICING. THE CAMERA ALSO CAME WITH EVERYTHING, THAT IS HOW I KNEW THAT IT WAS NOT A USED ITEM.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures, double-flashes
Reviews.Author: Vance
Reviews.Content: This camera is not what I expected at all after reading several positive reviews. Pictures are blurry, it shines a bright red light right in my children's eyes, and double flashes before taking a picture. My kids hate it and it hurts their eyes to take pictures. My 2.5 year-old son used to love having his picture taken, and now he hates it and automatically squints his eyes when we hold the camera up to take a picture. This camera has ruined everything that used to be fun about taking pictures, and I was unable to find any settings to turn any of the annoying "features" off. I have already submitted a return request and will be shipping this back in a few days. This is a horrible camera - don't believe the marketing hype. This is the worst "point-n-shoot" camera I have ever owned, and I will not buy another Nikon.

Reviews.Title: cute but can't see screen outside
Reviews.Author: P. Juner
Reviews.Content: needs a viewfinder.  Shopped around but this size camera from any of the companies of interest to me didn't have viewfinders.  Too bad coz I was in disneyland and the outdoor pics were guesswork during the day.  I must have good aim coz they turned out mostly ok.

Reviews.Title: Not worthy !
Reviews.Author: Johnny "J.O."
Reviews.Content: O.K. so I have owned a few Canon Camera's. Bought this Nikon thinking it would be a good unit.NOT !!Very poor quality pics, no eye-piece and the screen is to dull to see in full sun. I returned and went back to Canon.If you are used to Canon quality, this Cam will disapoint.Garbage imo.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: lindsay
Reviews.Content: absolute garbage.  Took the worst pictures i have ever seen.  Brought it on vacation to the carribean and the camera would not zoom, just kept flashing "lens error".  As soon as we jumped on the plane to leave it stopped.  Will be selling this camera for a new one immediatly.

Reviews.Title: WASTE of TIME
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Angstadt "MLmama"
Reviews.Content: Just don't bother spending the time and effort to order from this supplier.After going through the entire purchasing process: including paying the extra for "by Christmas delivery",  recieving confirmation of the purchase order, see the confirmation e-mail THEN recieve (1 minute later!) a message from ANDORAMA stating "OH WE ARE SORRY, this item is no longer in stock".The alert was fast but why was it needed at all? Why not alert DURING THE PURCHASE PROCESS!  Oh, I know why... now they have my money and i have to go through the process of CANCELING my order. Any type of customer service going into practice here would have prevented my time and money being spent on a non-existant item.BTW -Found the camera for a better price anyway at BEST BUY!I utilize Amazon frequently and am surprised that they allow for this type of issue to affect their site's reputaion. Why would one bother ordering items that are not in stock? The very least ANDORAMA could do was alert the buyer that there is a shortage or put a  "not available" status on the item vs. having the customer go through the wasteful experiment in making a ghost purchase.  Oh what fun that is...
